It’s been nice getting some ‘on air’ miles today with a brief return to radio. Thanks to @darrenstenhouse for giving me the opportunity to present Sunday breakfast @kingdomfm and raising my confidence. It was so good to be back on, it will always have a big piece of my heart. 📻 https://t.co/4sHzy61Z8X
@spudnando @kingdomfm 😂😂😂
@spudnando @kingdomfm Please tell me I'm not haunting you in your dreams! Haha! x

A fantastic night at Tynecastle Park with @ScotlandNT Under 21’s winning 3-0 vs Andorra. There was lots of children and young people in the 2,200 crowd, many at their first game which was great to see. A really enjoyable evening at @JamTarts #SCO21s #youngteam #monscotland https://t.co/RAZZ0P52dv
@MusicOwlScot @ScotlandNT @JamTarts Woop woop! Mon the #SCO21s ⚽️⚽️⚽️

Good news! @ScotlandNT under 21’s are 1-0 up on Andorra as we speak. I can also tell you winter is coming as it’s absolutely freezing here at @JamTarts Tynecastle Park! 😬😬😬 #SCO21s #youngteam https://t.co/jne0lSQka2
